Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.core.rule.variable.binding

Interface VariableBinding

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultVariableBinding
public interface VariableBinding
Represents a binding for the rule variables. A binding associates a value to each variable.

If the varible type is WSWRLVariableDomain.INDIVIDUALS the value is the WSWRLIndividual IRI.
If the varible type is WSWRLVariableDomain.DATA the value is the string representation of an OWLLiteral.

The internal WSWRLVariable of a variable is not modified until the nextBinding() function has been called.

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    int
    getBindingPossibilities()
    Returns the number of possibilities i.e., the cardinality of the Cartesian product of individuals who can be subjects of predicates
    boolean

    Returns wether another binding is remaining.
    void
    nextBinding()
    Changes the inner state of variables by setting their values according to this binding.
    void
    skipBinding()
    Skip the current binding to the next subject individuals binding.
    void
    skipByCause(WSWRLAtom atomCausedSkip)
    Skip one or several binding according to an atom.
